snippet: President Obama did not formally apologize for the bombs that the United States had dropped on the country but said that it would raise its aid to Laos....
abstract: Pres Obama publicly acknowledges damage caused by combat operations carried out by United States in Laos during Vietnam War; says US will double its aid to Laos to $30 million a year for three years to help find and dismantle exploded bombs; visit marks first trip to Laos by sitting American president.
lead_paragraph: President Obama did not formally apologize for the bombs that the United States had dropped on the country but said that it would raise its aid to Laos.

headline.main: Obama Acknowledges Scars of America’s Shadow War in Laos
headline.print_headline: Obama Acknowledges Suffering Caused by America’s Shadow War in Laos

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
